description:
The maid café where Asumi works is starting a housekeeping service. Nariyuki and Asumi go together to their first clients, who turn out to be people they know, like Mafuyu and Uruka.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: At Times, an Elder`s Pride Is in Direct Opposition to X`s Circumstances
Senjin no Hokori wa Toki ni [x] Domo no Jijou to Haihan Suru
先人の誇りは時に[x]どもの事情と背反する
